message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a substantial amount to you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $950000. Is this something you'd like to consider?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's a good value for my money.

I understand you're looking for a good value, but I have to consider the product's worth. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm counteroffering at $850000. This is a fair price, considering the product's unique features and benefits.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to compromise further and offer $750000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market rate.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I have to prioritize my own interests. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $820000. This is a fair price, considering the product's value and the market rate. I'm not willing to go any lower than this.

I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $790000. I think this is a fair compromise, considering the product's value and my budget.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one final offer, and that's $840000. This is my absolute minimum, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I believe the product's value justifies this price, and I'm hoping we can come to an agreement.

I understand your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one last attempt to compromise and offer $810000. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand you're trying to make a final compromise, but I'm still not willing to go below $840000. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to get as close to my target as possible. I'm counteroffering at $835000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I've gone as low as I can, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't come to an agreement. I'm willing to make one last attempt to compromise and offer $820000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
